name: Data Destoryer
description:
Move: W A S D

Attack: J

Goal: Destroy the pieces of Data around the map!

Backstory: You play as a Virus that has infected a computer, your goal is to destroy important pieces of data on this computer. there are computer vaccines (anti-virus) that wish to destroy you, so try your best to avoid them! There are 3 levels that you go through that ramp up in difficulty, when you die in any level you restart to level 1, so good luck!
